title: What you need to know for every NFL game in Week 17 -- including fantasy tips, playoff implications, predictions
description: Seahawks vs. Panthers? Jalen Hurts vs. Josh Allen? Picks, predictions, stats and what's at stake for every remaining Week 17 game.
source: NFL Nation, Eric Moody and Seth Walder

title: Aaron Rodgers, Baker Mayfield among players chasing millions in bonuses
description: Taking a look at contract bonuses as players try to maximize incentives.

title: Henry up to 10th all time in rushing, Ravens win
description: Baltimore running back Derrick Henry moved into 10th place all time in NFL rushing yards Saturday night, finishing with 216, to go along with four touchdowns on the ground, as the Ravens produced a 41-24 win over the Green Bay Packers at Lambeau Field.

title: Bears clinch North title with GB loss; 1st since '18
description: The Chicago Bears locked up the NFC North on Saturday night at the conclusion of Green Bay's 41-24 loss to Baltimore.

title: Packers unsure on Week 18 QB after Willis shines
description: Packers coach Matt LaFleur was noncommittal about the team's starting quarterback for next weekend's regular-season finale after backup quarterback Malik Willis went 18-of-21 for 288 yards and a touchdown in Saturday's loss to the Ravens.

title: Slumping Lakers hold meeting, eye 'recalibration'
description: Lakers coach JJ Redick said Saturday was a day of "recalibration and reconnection" for slumping Los Angeles, which has lost three straight and six of 10.

title: Pels' Alvarado, Suns' Williams tossed after fight
description: Suns center Mark Williams and Pelicans point guard Jose Alvarado were ejected after getting into a fight in the third quarter Saturday night.

title: Pulisic nets in Milan win, on pace for best campaign
description: Christian Pulisic is on pace for the best season of his career -- in a season that will conclude with a home World Cup played in the United States.

title: UVA sheds ACC title game loss, secures 11th win
description: Virginia quarterback Chandler Morris threw for 198 yards and the No. 20 Cavaliers, who lost in the ACC title game to Duke with a shot at the College Football Playoff on the line, outlasted 25th-ranked Missouri 13-7 in the Gator Bowl on Saturday night.

title: Giannis returns, draws Bulls' ire with late dunk
description: Giannis Antetokounmpo scored 29 points in his return from an eight-game absence Saturday night, punctuating the Milwaukee Bucks' 112-103 victory over the Chicago Bulls at United Center with a windmill dunk at the buzzer that drew the ire of the home team.
